title: Австрия все още без позиция за пълното ни приемане в Шенген
content: До този момент нямаме категорична позиция на Австрия за пълноправното ни членство в Шенген. Така отговори на въпрос на Клуб Z вътрешният министър Атанас Илков. Той участва в Съвет „Вътрешни работи“ в Люксембург. Сред обсъжданите теми е състоянието на прилагането на Шенгенското законодателство в България и Румъния. Засега обаче няма насрочено решение за пълноправното приемане на двете държави в Шенгенското пространство. Именно заради противопоставянето на Австрия бяхме приети в общността само по въздух и вода. „Като изискване към нас няма нещо, което да не сме изпълнили. Напротив – направили сме повече от това, което се искаше, като повишаване на капацитета на граничната полиция, с цялото техническщо оборудване, с всички мерки, които прилагаме по противодействието на организираните пресъпни групи, извършващи незаконен трафик“ , каза Илков. Той допълни, че важен елемент от дейността ни е стратегическото сътрудничество с Турция. Австрийският вътрешен министър Герхард Карнер заяви преди началото на заседанието, че България и Румъния се движат в правилна посока, но още не са изминали пътя. Засега няма индикации за промяна на позицията на Нидерландия, отговори Илков на друг въпрос на Клуб Z. Ниската земя, заедно с Австрия допоследно се противопоставяше на приемането ни, но накрая ни пусна. В края на 2023 г. обаче в Нидерландия спечели крайната десница на Герт Вилдерс. Негов съпартиец е държавният секретар за правосъдието и сигурността Ингрид Кунради, която отговаря и за...

title: LC Brühl verliert erneut +++ Langfinger bricht Kasse auf – noch vor Ladenschluss +++ Gallusfest bietet Einblicke in die Entwicklung des Spitals
content: Feedback: stadtredaktion@chmedia.ch Am Mittwochabend hat die Stadtpolizei im Rahmen einer Verkehrskontrolle vier Personen angehalten, die im angetrunkenen Zustand mit dem Auto unterwegs waren. Sie durften nicht weiterfahren und werden angezeigt. Sämtliche Kontrollen ereigneten sich zwischen 22 und 23 Uhr. Wie die Stadtpolizei in der Medienmitteilung schreibt, wurde ein 43-jähriger Mann an der Museumsstrasse, eine 35-jährige Frau an der Flurhofstrasse und zwei Frauen im Alter von 62 Jahren und 71 Jahren an der St.Jakob-Strasse mit Alkohol im Blut erwischt. Ihre Werte lagen zwischen 0,6 und 0,8 Promille. (stapo/arc) Der LC Brühl verliert mit dem 23:27 gegen GC Amicitia Zürich in der 6. Runde der Nationalliga A seine dritte Partie der Saison und ist damit auf Position 5 der Tabelle rangiert. «Es waren wieder zu viele Fehler und zu viele Fehlwürfe, die wir uns leisteten. Gegen einen konsequent zu Werke gehenden Gegner reicht dies dann nicht zum Erfolg», musste die St.Galler Topskorerin Lorena Baljak feststellen. Trotz der Unzulänglichkeiten waren die Zürcherinnen kein übermächtiger und unbezwingbarer Gegner. Insbesondere in der 1. Halbzeit war der Spielverlauf ein ausgeglichener, kein Team konnte sich je einmal einer Führung von mehr als zwei Toren erfreuen. Die 32 Tore der ersten 30 Spielminuten zum 15:17-Halbzeitergebnis zeigten auch auf, dass beide Teams defensive Schwächen und keine guten Torhüterinnenleistungen hatten. Nach der Pause konnte GC Amicitia seinen...

title: Беларускія і расійскія актывы вытворцы Dove i Rexona перайшлі да вытворцы «Дыхлафоса»
Integra IECM 11 comisiones para el periodo 2024-2025
creator: Rodrigo Cerezo
content: El Consejo General del Instituto Electoral de la Ciudad de México (IECM) aprobó por unanimidad la integración de 11 comisiones, 7 permanentes y 4 provisionales, que operarán por un año, para el periodo 2024-2025. Como comisiones permanentes estarán Asociaciones Políticas y Fiscalización ; Participación Ciudadana y Capacitación; Organización Electoral y Geoestadística; Género, Derechos Humanos, Educación Cívica y Construcción Ciudadana; Quejas; Normatividad y Transparencia; Seguimiento al SPEN. Como comisiones provisionales fueron aprobadas la de Desarrollo de Sistemas Informáticos ; Vinculación con Organismos Externo s ; Voto de personas Extranjeras , en estado de postración y en prisión preventiva; Seguimiento de la participación política de las mujeres y grupos de atención prioritaria. La consejera María de Los Ángeles Gil Sánchez señaló que para la propuesta de integración, se valoró el perfil y el área de conocimiento del conjunto de las consejerías y se privilegió un equilibrio en la carga de actividades y frecuencia en el desahogo de los trabajos. De igual forma, se aprobó el Programa Anual de Desarrollo Archivístico (PADA) de 2025, que establece los puntos para la gestión, conservación y accesibilidad de los archivos del órgano para el año próximo. En la primera sesión extraordinaria del Comité Técnico Interno de Administración de Documentos (Coteciad), se avaló el proyecto de l PADA 2025 a fin de someterlo a consideración...

title: DICEOMANCER Rolls Onto Steam Today
creator: Deepak Chongtham
content: Developer Ultra Piggy Studio and publisher Gamirror Games have officially released their latest title, DICEOMANCER on Steam today. This card-based roguelike game is currently available for $13.49 at a 10% launch discount. Hurry up and grab your copy for a unique experience before the offer ends on 16 October. Moreover, there is also a free demo for everyone to try out before fully diving into it. At first, DICEOMANCER might look like a typical deck-building roguelike, where you move through nodes, fight enemies, face events, and upgrade your cards. You need to manage your mana wisely to play cards and block enemy attacks. But if it were just another card game, it would be called “CARDOMANCER.” DICEOMANCER, however, is something more. What makes this game unique is its special dice mechanic that lets players change in-game numbers. For example, a card that deals “1 damage” can be upgraded to “6 damage” with a roll of a six-sided die. Drawing “1 card” can turn into drawing “6 cards,” and gaining “1 strength” might become gaining “6 strength.” These dice rolls unlock endless strategies to boost your deck’s power. Furthermore, the dice are not just for show as they impact almost every number in the game. Got an enemy with 30 health? Roll a die and change that. Only 1 coin left? A ten-sided die might boost your wealth. Running low on energy with just 4 points? A roll could increase your energy limit. But beware as the power comes with risk. The outcomes are random, and a bad roll...

title: Turismo reitera su compromiso en que los destinos cumplan la ordenanza en materia de pisos vacacionales
content: MADRID, 10 (EUROPA PRESS) El Ministerio de Industria y Turismo ha reiterado su compromiso en que se cumpla con la ordenanza turística de cada uno de los territorios españoles en materia de pisos vacacionales, ofreciendo herramientas, tanto legales como tecnológicas, para que «puedan cumplir sus obligaciones de inspección y sanción». Así lo ha manifestado la secretaria de Estado de Turismo, Rosario Sánchez, durante una entrevista en el III Ágora de Turismo Sostenible de Green & Human organizado por Hosteltur y celebrado este jueves en Madrid. Aunque ha insistido en que las competencias corren a cargo de las comunidades autónomas y de los municipios, Sánchez ha explicado que «hay un reglamento europeo que prevé que las plataformas rindan información» para lograr «más transparencia» en el mercado. «Estamos trabajando en el desarrollo tecnológico para la implantación del reglamento europeo, conjuntamente con Vivienda, porque no es solo vivienda vacacional, también es de corta duración», ha añadido la secretaria de Estado. Con respecto a la celebración de ayer del Consejo Español de Turismo y la firma de una declaración conjunta hacia un turismo sostenible, ha valorado que es «un paso importante» unir a, tanto el sector privado como público, y mostrar el compromiso de todos con un sector responsable. En esta línea, ha avanzado que «ahora» se empezará a ver «la capilaridad» de los fondos europeos, que «van destinados también a mejorar la vida de los...

title: Loophole allowed top NYPD official to reap tens of thousands in OT despite department rules barring it
creator: Craig McCarthy
content: A top NYPD official quietly pocketed tens of thousands of dollars in overtime pay last year — despite department rules barring managers from collecting such compensation, The Post has learned. Deputy Commissioner of Operations Kaz Daughtry — an NYPD liaison to City Hall — made $60,000 more than the department’s top cop in 2023, thanks in part to a payroll loophole that allowed him to reap time and a half. “Welcome to Mayor [Eric] Adams’ NYPD,” one source quipped of how Daughtry was apparently allowed to game the system. “While the lower ranks have their overtime scrutinized down to the minute, Kaz parades around and abuses the very system he claimed to be fixing.” The NYPD’s Administrative Guide bars manager-level employees from being paid beyond their 80-hour workweek. But after being promoted from first-rank detective to an assistant commissioner role last July, Daughtry continued to put in for OT. His paystub for the final full period of last year shows he logged nearly 80 extra hours between Dec. 9-22 — racking up just under $15,000 in bonus cash. He even put in for bonus pay for working the night shift — an added perk usually reserved for rank-and-file cops forced to pull one of the most undesirable shifts — for an added $1,000. “He made what?!” fumed one former NYPD chief while reviewing the paystub, which The Post obtained via the Freedom of Information Law. “No one should be making overtime as an executive,” the former chief said, echoing the sentiment of more than a...

title: Kontrolle verloren - Zillertal: E-Bikerin auf Wanderweg schwer gestürzt
content: Fataler Freizeitunfall am späten Mittwochnachmittag im Tiroler Zillertal: Eine 64-jährige Einheimische kam mit ihrem Elektrofahrrad zu Sturz und zog sich dabei erhebliche Verletzungen zu. Sie musste mit der Rettung ins Krankenhaus eingeliefert werden. Ereignet hat sich der Unfall gegen 16.45 Uhr im Gemeindegebiet von Mayrhofen. Die Einheimische sei mit ihrem E-Bike auf einem Wander- bzw. Gehweg östlich des Ziller-Flusses gefahren, wie die Polizei berichtete. Kontrolle verloren und gestürzt Plötzlich dürfte die Frau die Kontrolle verloren haben. Sie kam ohne jegliche Fremdeinwirkung zu Sturz und erlitt dabei erhebliche Verletzungen. Nach der Erstversorgung am Unfallort wurde die 64-Jährige mit der Rettung ins Bezirkskrankenhaus Schwaz eingeliefert. Willkommen in unserer Community! title: Philadelphia Twins Triumph over Conjoined Birth with Advanced Surgery
creator: Carol Kay
content: Twin brothers from Philadelphia recently celebrated their first birthday after a remarkable journey that began with their birth as conjoined twins. Amari and Javar Ruffin entered the world via cesarean section on September 29, 2023, weighing a combined six pounds. The boys shared significant portions of their sternum, diaphragm, abdominal wall, and liver. A complex and meticulously planned surgical procedure took place on August 21 at the Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia. The operation, which spanned eight hours, involved over two dozen specialists, including surgeons, anesthesiologists, radiologists, and nurses. The team employed advanced techniques, using layers of mesh and plastic surgery methods, to reconstruct and close the boys’ abdomens after their separation. The Ruffin family, including parents Tim and Shaneka, along with siblings Kaylum and Anora, eagerly welcomed Amari and Javar back home on October 8. The emotional reunion marked a new chapter for the family. “Seeing them each in their own beds was an indescribable feeling,” expressed Shaneka Ruffin. “It feels like we are beginning a new journey as a family of six. We are so grateful to CHOP for helping make this day possible and letting us start this next chapter.” The discovery of the twins’ condition came during a routine ultrasound twelve weeks into Shaneka’s pregnancy. Initially advised to terminate the pregnancy due to the boys’ rare and complex condition, the Ruffins sought a second opinion. They found...

title: NFL and NBA Outshine Hockey in Ontario’s Betting Market
creator: Carol Kay
content: Since Ontario’s regulated sports betting market launched in April 2022, one surprising trend has emerged: hockey, Canada’s national sport, hasn’t dominated the betting scene as many expected. The NFL, followed by the NBA, leads in popularity among bettors, with hockey coming in third according to most sportsbooks. Despite this, NHL excitement is at a peak with the start of the new season. The Toronto Maple Leafs face the Montreal Canadiens tonight, with the Leafs favored at 1.50 on the Moneyline at BetMGM. The Winnipeg Jets will clash with the Oilers in Edmonton, where the Oilers are favorites at 1.55, and the Calgary Flames will battle the Vancouver Canucks, with the Canucks favored at 1.48. “The NFL is king,” remarked a PointsBet Canada trader, but Johnny Avello, DraftKings’ Director of Race & Sportsbook Operations, emphasized hockey’s significance. “Hockey continues to flourish, and we at DraftKings love the sport. It’s certainly not as big as football and basketball in terms of betting volume, but it’s super popular. So far, bettors like the Leafs in tonight’s matchup.” At FanDuel, bettors are eyeing the Oilers to win the Stanley Cup this year, with the New York Rangers and Florida Panthers following close behind. The Leafs rank fourth in terms of bets placed to win the championship. Auston Matthews and Connor McDavid are already fan favorites for the Hart Trophy (MVP), collectively accumulating over 50% of all bets. “For Ontario bettors, hockey remains one of the top...

title: Erste Fälle von Vogelgrippe
content: Der Betrieb halte 150 Hühner sowie einige Gänse und Enten. Ein Teil sei an der Erkrankung verendet, der Rest wird auf behördliche Anordnung hin getötet. Agrar-Landesrätin Michaela Langer-Weninger betont: „Für uns Menschen besteht keine Gefahr. Das Risiko einer Übertragung der Vogelgrippe vom Tier auf den Menschen ist sehr gering. Auch eine Übertragung des Virus durch Lebensmittel ist ausgeschlossen". Schutz- und Überwachungszone eingerichtet Rund um die betroffene Haltung wurde für mindestens 21 Tage eine Schutz- und für mindestens 30 Tage eine Überwachungszone eingerichtet. „Ergänzend achten unsere Betriebe nun auf die strikte Einhaltung von betrieblichen Sicherheitsmaßnahmen. Dazu gehört etwa das Tragen einer Schutzkleidung und die gründliche Desinfektion von Schuhen vor dem Betreten des Geflügelstalls“, so Langer-Weninger. In der Schutzzone werden alle Geflügelhaltungen amtstierärztlich kontrolliert. Verendete Tiere in freier Natur nicht berühren In freier Natur sei Vorsicht geboten. Verendete Wasser- und Raubvögel sollten keinesfalls berührt werden, sondern der Fundort umgehend der zuständigen Bezirksverhaltungsbehörde gemeldet werden.

title: VIDEO / Audi je predstavio novu verziju svog najpopularnijeg SUV-a, a stiže i kao benzin i kao dizel
content: Audi je nedavno predstavio novu verziju svog najpopularnijeg SUV-a - Q5. Linija ove treće generacije stvara snažnu siluetu te spaja prednja i stražnja svjetla i čini cijeli izgled automobila dužim. Benzin i dizel U Audiju kažu da je unutrašnjost usmjerena na korisnika i pregledna. Ondje se najviše ističe takozvana digitalna pozornica koja uključuje tri ekrana – jedan ispred vozača, jedan ispred suvozača i jedan u sredini kokpita. Što se motora tiče u ponudi je jedan dizelski i dva benzinska, a snaga se kreće od 204 do 367 konjskih snaga u snažnijoj S verziji. Novi Q5 modeli su već dostupni u Hrvatskoj, a poznate su i cijene koje se kreću od 57.269,67 eura. title: Kayıp Rojin nerede? Nihat Uludağ yeni detayı canlı yayında anlattı
content: Van'da 27 Eylül'den beri kayıp olan üniversite öğrencisi Rojin Kabaiş'i arama çalışmaları sürüyor. Özellikle yeni görüntüler var. Rojin'in yurttan çıkarken güvenlik kameralarına yansıyan görüntüleri ortaya çıktı. Peki, Rojin nerede? CNN TÜRK İstanbul Haber Müdürü Nihat Uludağ, yeni detayları canlı yayında anlattı. EKİPLER ROJİN KABAİŞ'İN BULUNMASI İÇİN TEYAKKUZDA Rojin Kabaiş, 27 Eylül'de kaldığı öğrenci yurdunda akşam yemeğini yedikten sonra dışarı çıkmıştı. O günden sonra kendisinden bir daha haber alınamadı. Ekipler, tüm birlikleriyle Rojin'in bulunması için günlerdir çalışıyor. KALDIĞI YURTTAN ÇIKIŞ YAPTIĞI AN KAMERADA Bu kapsamda yurttan ayrılan Rojin'e ait yeni görüntüler ortaya çıktı. Güvenlik kameralarına yansıyan görüntüde Rojin'in yurttaki turnikeden geçtiği ve telefonuyla ilgilendiği görülüyor. ARAMA ÇALIŞMALARI NE DURUMDA, GİZEMİ BEYAZ ARABA MI ÇÖZECEK? title: Nobel Edebiyat Ödülü sahibi Han Kang kimdir, eserleri neler?
content: 2024 Nobel Edebiyat Ödülü'nün sahibi Güney Koreli yazar Han Kang oldu. Uluslararası alanda tanınırlığı olan Kang sayısız esere imza atmıştı. Peki, Nobel Edebiyat Ödülü sahibi Han Kang kimdir, en çok bilinen eserleri neler? Nobel Edebiyat Ödülü 'nün bu yılki sahibi belli oldu. Güney Koreli yazar Han Kang ödüle layık görüldü. İşte Kang hakkında merak edilen detaylar... Nobel Edebiyat Ödülü sahibi Han Kang kimdir, eserleri neler? Han Kang, Güney Koreli bir yazardır ve en çok bilinen eseri The Vegetarian (Vejetaryen) ile uluslararası tanınmış bir isimdir. 1970 yılında Gwangju’da doğmuştur. Han Kang, edebiyat dünyasına genç yaşta adım atmış ve ilk hikayesi 1993 yılında yayımlanmıştır. Eserlerinde genellikle insan doğası, şiddet, toplumsal normlar ve bireysel özgürlük gibi temaları işler. The Vegetarian, 2007 yılında yayımlanmış ve büyük yankı uyandırmıştır. Bu roman, 2016 yılında İngilizceye çevrilmiş ve Man Booker Uluslararası Ödülü’nü kazanmıştır. Roman, toplumun dayatmalarına karşı duran ve kendi bedenini kontrol etmeyi seçen bir kadının hikayesini anlatır. Han Kang’ın bu eseri, insanın iç dünyasına ve toplumsal baskılara karşı bireysel direnişe dair derinlikli bir bakış sunar. Han Kang, ayrıca Human Acts (İnsanlar, 2014) ve The White Book (Beyaz Kitap, 2016) gibi önemli eserler de kaleme almıştır. Yazar, Güney Kore’nin modern tarihinden ve kişisel deneyimlerinden ilham alarak edebi eserler üretmeye devam...

title: Deutsche'den dikkat çeken Türkiye borsası ve faiz analizi!
content: Deutsche Bank'ın iştiraki DWS Investment, Türk borsasına yönelik analizinde hisse senetlerinin performansını artırmak için faiz indirimine ihtiyaç olduğunu vurguladı. DWS Investment, Türkiye 'ye fon girişinin sağlanabilmesi için faiz indirimlerinin daha yakın bir tarihte gerçekleşmesi ve enflasyonun kazançlar üzerindeki etkisinin daha fazla fiyatlanması gerektiğini belirtti. Bloomberg’e açıklamalarda bulunan DWS Investment Portföy Yöneticisi Sebastian Kahlfeld, “Enflasyon muhasebesi yapmak zorunda kalan şirketler, piyasa beklentilerinin oldukça altında sonuçlar açıkladı, bu da yatırımcılar arasında yüksek belirsizlik yarattı. İlk olarak, yatırımcıların bu durumu sindirmesini, sonrasında ise düşen politika faizlerinin tetikleyici rol oynamasını bekliyoruz” dedi. Kahlfeld, “Yatırımcılar bu yılın sonuna doğru Türkiye'de enflasyonun azalacağı ve faiz oranlarının düşeceğine dair büyük umutlar taşıyordu. Ancak bu beklentiler gelecek yıla ertelenmek zorunda kaldı ve bu durum piyasada yatırım için uygun ortamı zayıflattı” ifadelerini kullandı. Enflasyon azaldıkça yerli yatırımcıların Türk hisse senedi varlıklarını azaltıp daha az riskli yatırım araçlarına yönelmesini bekleyen Kahlfeld, faizler düşmeye başladığında borsaya yabancı yatırımcı çekilememesinin de bir başka endişe kaynağı olabileceğini ifade etti. Kahlfeld ayrıca, “Eğer rakip piyasalar daha güçlü makroekonomik temellere sahip olursa, uluslararası yatırımcılar Endonezya...

title: Ryanair streicht massiv Verbindungen am Hamburger Flughafen
content: Ryanair streicht sein Flugangebot in Deutschland zusammen. In Hamburg fallen ab nächstem Sommer 60 Prozent der Sitzplätze weg. Drei Airports fliegt Europas größte Billigfluglinie gar nicht mehr an. Das gab Ryanair am Donnerstag bekannt. Das ist ein schwerer Schlag für den Flughafen Hamburg und viele Fluggäste. Allein in Fuhlsbüttel bietet die irische Biligfluglinie 400.000 Passagier-Sitze weniger an ab nächstem Sommer. Ein sichtbar frustrierter Ryanair-Chef Eddie Wilson sagte NDR 90,3: "In Hamburg streichen wir 60 Prozent der Sitzplatzkapazität. Elf Verbindungen fallen weg. Malaga, Zadar, Valencia und Porto werden nächstes Jahr nicht mehr angeflogen, auch Edinburgh fällt weg." Ryanair fliegt ab Hamburg dann nur noch nach London, Dublin, Alicante, Danzig und Mallorca, dünnt die Anzahl der Flüge außerdem aus. Nach Palma gibt es pro Woche nur noch 7 statt jetzt 17 Verbindungen. Wilson schimpfte auf die Bundesregierung: Mit der im Mai erhöhten Luftverkehrssteuer mache sie günstige Flüge unmöglich. Deshalb zahle man in Deutschland die höchsten Flugpreise Europas. Viele Menschen könnten nun nicht mehr fliegen, auch weil Verbindungen fehlten, so der Ryanair-Chef. Noch schlimmer als Hamburg trifft es die Flughäfen in Dortmund, Dresden und Leipzig. Sie fliegt die Billigfluglinie gar nicht mehr an. Bis September sind rund 670 Flugzeuge am Helmut-Schmidt-Airport nach 23 Uhr gestartet oder gelandet - rund sieben Prozent mehr als im Vorjahr. (25.09.2024) mehr Der...

title: PSG : Son agent lâche une grande annonce pour son transfert
content: Malgré Nuno Mendes, le PSG pourrait recruter un nouvel arrière gauche dans les mois à venir. En ce sens, un nom est à nouveau revenu dans le viseur du club de la capitale : Theo Hernandez. L'international français est aujourd'hui au Milan AC et alors qu'une prolongation de contrat a aussi été évoqué, son agent a mis les choses au point. Alors que le PSG peut déjà compter sur Lucas Hernandez , voilà qu'il pourrait être rejoint par son frère. A 27 ans, Theo Hernandez évolue aujourd'hui au Milan AC , où il est sous contrat jusqu'en 2026. Alors que la presse italienne a associé l'international français au PSG , une prolongation est aussi évoquée pour Theo Hernandez. Mercato - PSG : Grande nouvelle dévoilée par la presse italienne ? https://t.co/ZC6Q01KrPL pic.twitter.com/yiM4iFWiGa Agent de Theo Hernandez, Manuel Garcia Quilon a répondu à cette potentielle prolongation de contrat avec le Milan AC. Le représentant du Français a alors avoué pour TeleLombardia : « Il n'y a pas de négociations, nous n'avons parlé de rien depuis quatre mois. Le club m'a contacté, ils nous ont demandé si le joueur voulait rester et s'il était content à Milan. J'ai dit oui ». « Il est très attaché à la ville, très bien ancré dans le football italien. Il est heureux ici avec sa famille et son fils. Theo est à Milan depuis six ans et les actions sont plus éloquentes que les mots. Nous n'avons aucune proposition sur la table, nous n'avons aucune offre du club », a...

title: SSC brinda apoyo a las mascotas de Xochimilco
creator: Ángel Ortíz
content: Las inundaciones en la alcaldía Xochimilco no solo dañaron viviendas, también afectaron a casi cien perros y gatos que habitan en la demarcación, por lo que la Policía capitalina les brindó alimento y agua, mientras que la jurisdicción continúa con las labores de limpieza en la zona afectada. Junto con médicos veterinarios zootecnistas, elementos de la Brigada de Vigilancia Animal (BVA) recorrieron las calles de la colonia Caltongo , una de las zonas más afectadas, con el objetivo de identificar, alimentar y brindar cualquier tipo de ayuda a los animales de compañía que quedaron expuestos tras las condiciones de emergencia que provocaron las lluvias del domingo pasado al sur de la capital del país. Luego de poco más de cuatro horas de búsqueda de los seres sintientes que requirieron atención y ayuda, los brigadistas alimentaron a 88 canes y 23 felinos; además, los veterinarios les practicaron una revisión médica y les otorgaron un tratamiento para infecciones oculares y dermatomicosis, que es una enfermedad de la piel causada por un hongo la cual suele generar erupciones y descamación. La S ecretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana (SSC) aseguró que las labores implementadas por los especialistas en bienestar animal se suman a los trabajos por parte de diferentes autoridades como los gobiernos local y central, que emprendieron las acciones emergentes desde los primeros momentos de emergencia. Por su parte, la alcaldesa de Xochimilco, Circe Camacho, informó a...

title: Bankruptcy Court Approves Crypto Exchange FTX Liquidation, Paves Way for $16B Customer Repayments
creator: Catherine W
content: On Monday, a US bankruptcy court officially approved the liquidation plan for cryptocurrency exchange FTX, allowing the company to repay its customers using approximately $16 billion in recovered assets. This decision comes at a pivotal moment for the crypto market, as creditors are set to receive more than $12 billion through the court-sanctioned payout plan. This influx of funds raises the possibility of reinvestment into the digital asset ecosystem, potentially impacting market prices. In June, FTX reported having $12.6 billion available for customer repayments, a figure that could rise to $16.5 billion as additional assets are identified and liquidated. The initial distribution of around $1.1 billion, though relatively modest, is expected to provide support for Bitcoin (BTC) and other cryptocurrencies such as Solana (SOL) and Ethereum (ETH), according to Alex Thorn, the head of research at Galaxy Digital Holdings. Benjamin Celermajer, co-chief investment officer at Magnet Capital, noted that the upcoming payouts “effectively provide liquidity to known crypto traders.” He emphasized the likelihood that some of these funds will flow back into the cryptocurrency market, potentially acting as a price catalyst for “liquidity-starved assets.” However, it is important to mention that the repayments from FTX will not occur immediately. The exchange must establish a trust and hire a company to oversee the distribution process, according to Bloomberg reports. Galaxy Digital...

title: احکامات کے باوجود چار بھائیوں کی عدم بازیابی، چیف جسٹس اسلام آباد ہائی کورٹ پولیس افسران پر برہم
creator: none@none.com (آصف نوید)
content: چاروں بھائی جنوی سے لاپتا ہیں اور عدالتی حکم کے باوجود تاحال چاروں لاپتہ بھائی بازیاب نہ ہوسکے۔ دوران سماعت عدالت نے ایس ایس پی انویسٹی گیشن کو مغویوں کی بازیابی کے لیے ہر ممکن اقدامات کرنت کی ہدایت کی اور وزارت دفاع ، داخلہ ، ایف آئی اے سمیت دیگر اداروں سے بھی رپورٹ طلب کرلی۔ عدالت نے مغویوں کی بازیابی کیلئے تمام انٹیلی جنس ایجنسیوں کے اداروں کو خط لکھنے کی ہدایت بھی کی۔ چیف جسٹس اسلام آباد ہائی کورٹ عامر فاروق نے کہا کہ تمام اداروں اور صوبوں کو خط لکھیں اور اگلے ہفتے پیش رفت رپورٹ سے آگاہ کریں۔ اس دوران ایس ایس پی انویسٹی گیشن اسلام آباد اور ایس ایس پی آپریشنز راولپنڈی بھی عدالت میں پیش ہوئے۔ سماعت کے دوران چیف جسٹس عامر فاروق نے افسران پر برہمی کا اظہار کیا۔ چیف جسٹس نے پولیس افسران کے ساتھ مکالمہ کرتے ہوئے کہا کہ اسلام آباد پولیس کا تو کوئی حال ہی نہیں ہے، کوئی ذمہ داری نہیں لیتا۔ چیف جسٹس نے پنڈی پولیس کے ایس ایس پی سے مکالمہ کرتے ہوئے کہا کہ کیا پنجاب میں بھی تفتیشی افسر ایسے ہی ہیں؟ اسلام آباد میں تو کوئی ملکیت ہی نہیں لیتا، آج یہاں ہیں کل آئی جی صاحب تبدیل ہوں گے تو یہ بھی کہیں چلے جائیں گے اور بات ختم، پنجاب میں تو ٹرانسفر ہو کر بھی پنجاب میں ہی گھومتے ہیں۔ ایس ایس پی اسلام آباد نے کہا کہ تفتیشی افسران کو تربیتی نشستیں کروا رہے ہیں، آگے بہتری ہوگی۔ جس پر چیف جسٹس عامر فاروق نے کہا کہ ایسے نہیں ہوتا، یہاں تو جائے وقوعہ کے فنگرپرنٹس بھی نہیں لیے جاتے اور نہ جانے کیا کیا خامیاں ہیں، سی ڈی آر کا پتہ نہیں ہوتا نہ کوئی ریکارڈ پورا ہوتا ہے، ایسے تو اگلے دس سال کچھ نہیں ہونا، چیف جسٹس نے ہدایت کی کہ تفتیشی افسر کو تبدیل کریں، چیزیں سب فنگر ٹپس پر...

title: Elütöttek egy nőt Szegeden, súlyos állapotban van
content: "Úgy tudjuk, hogy súlyos az állapota annak a nőnek, akit elütött egy autó Szegeden a Kelemen és a Victor Hugo utca kereszteződésében. A nőt a szegedi klinikán ápolják - írja a Délmagyar . A baleset szerdán délelőtt történt, amikor a gyalogos nem a gyalogátkelőhelyen, hanem a villamossíneken és a közúton akart átkelni. A jármű a felújított DÉMÁSZ székház kapujába csapódott, szerencsére nem sodort el másokat a járdán. A helyszínelés több órát vett igénybe, addig az érintett szakaszon nem jártak a villamosok és a tram-train sem. Egy hete írtunk arról, hogy egy gyalogost halálra gázoltak Debrecenben . Sepsiszentgyörgyön két fiatal ellen indult eljárás. Egy 19 éves férfi részegen, jogosítvány nélkül vezetett , és az autóval áthajtott egy kerítésen. Az anyósülésen ülő utas ellen is eljárás indult, ugyanis övé volt az autó, amit rábízott a részeg barátjára. Parkoló teherautónak ütközött egy férfi Esztergomban, aki részegen vezetett és túl gyorsan hajtott .

title: LIVE TJ - Frattura lievemente scomposta della seconda costola per Koopmeiners
content: 13:44 - IL BOLLETTINO MEDICO SULLE CONDIZIONI DI KOOPMEINERS- La Juventus, tramite il suo sito internet ufficiale, ha diramato il bollettino medico sulle condizioni di Teun Koopmeiners: "Teun Koopmeiners, a seguito del persistere della sintomatologia dolorosa accusato al termine del primo tempo della partita contro il Cagliari, è stato sottoposto questa mattina, 10 ottobre 2024, ad esami diagnostici presso il J|medical che hanno evidenziato la presenza di frattura lievemente scomposta della seconda costa anteriore destra. Il giocatore sarà sottoposto alle terapie del caso e la ripresa sarà valutata in base alla sintomatologia", si legge su Juventus.com. 12:45 - KOOPMEINERS È AL JMEDICAL - Teun Koopmeiners è appena arrivato al JMedical per sottoporsi ad accertamenti strumentali alla costola. Gli esami serviranno per capire qual è l'entità del problema all'osso toracico di cui soffre l'olandese.

title: Γάζα: 28 νεκροί και 54 τραυματίες ο απολογισμός ισραηλινού πλήγματος σε σχολείο σύμφωνα με τον παλαιστινιακό Ερυθρό Σταυρό
creator: ΑΘΗΝΑΪΚΟ - ΜΑΚΕΔΟΝΙΚΟ ΠΡΑΚΤΟΡΕΙΟ ΕΙΔΗΣΕΩΝ
content: Ο παλαιστινιακός Ερυθρός Σταυρός ανακοίνωσε ότι σήμερα κατέγραψε 28 θανάτους μετά από ισραηλινό πλήγμα σε σχολείο της Ντέιρ Αλ-Μπάλαχ, στο κεντρικό τμήμα της Λωρίδας της Γάζας. Οι ομάδες του Ερυθρού Σταυρού κατέγραψαν 28 νεκρούς και περιέθαλψαν 54 τραυματίες ύστερα από πλήγμα του ισραηλινού στρατού κατοχής σε σχολείο, «κοντά στα γραφεία μας στη Ντέιρ Αλ-Μπάλαχ», σύμφωνα με την ανακοίνωση. Ο ισραηλινός στρατός από τη πλευρά του ανακοίνωσε ότι εξαπέλυσε αεροπορική επίθεση «ακριβείας» κατά «τρομοκρατών» σε διοικητικό κέντρο που βρισκόταν σε κτίρια που προηγουμένως χρησιμοποιούνταν ως σχολείο.

title: இலக்கியத்திற்கான நோபல் பரிசு அறிவிப்பு!
creator: DIN
content: இலக்கியத்திற்கான நோபல் பரிசு தென் கொரிய எழுத்தாளர் ஹான் காங்குக்கு அறிவிக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. மருத்துவம், இயற்பியல், வேதியியல், பொருளாதாரம், அமைதி, இலக்கியம் ஆகிய துறைகளில் சாதனை படைத்தவர்களுக்கு ஒவ்வொரு ஆண்டும் நோபல் பரிசு வழங்கப்பட்டு வருகிறது. 2024 ஆம் ஆண்டுக்கான நோபல் விருதுகள் கடந்த திங்கள்கிழமை முதல் அறிவிக்கப்பட்டு வருகின்றன. மருத்துவம், இயற்பியல், வேதியியல் துறைகளுகளுக்கு அறிவிக்கப்பட்ட நிலையில், இன்று இலக்கியத்திற்கான நோபல் பரிசை அறிவித்துள்ளனர்.

title: 국감서 '공천 개입' 공방...명태균·김영선 동행명령도
creator: 윤솔
content: 국감서 '공천 개입' 공방...명태균·김영선 동행명령도 [뉴스리뷰] [앵커] 오늘(10일) 국회 국정감사에서 동행명령장이 또 발부됐습니다. 행정안전위의 국감에 이른바 '공천 개입' 의혹의 핵심 인물들이 불출석하자 야당 주도로 이렇게 의결한 건데요. 여당은 강하게 반발했습니다. 윤솔 기자입니다. [기자] "김영선 증인과 명태균 증인에 대한 동행명령을 즉각 집행해주시기를 바랍니다." 국회 행정안전위원회는 이른바 '김건희 여사 공천 개입 의혹'과 관련해 증인으로 채택된 명태균 씨와 김영선 전 의원을 상대로 동행명령장을 발부했습니다. 야당은 연일 의혹이 제기되는 만큼 반드시 불러야 한다고 주장했고, 여당에선 불출석 사유서까지 제출한 증인들이라며 반발했습니다. "민주당 입맛에 맞는 2명만 동행명령장을 발부하겠다고 합니다. 과연 이것이 형평에 맞는 동행명령장입니까?" "위 두 사람은 김건희 공천 개입 의혹의 전말을 밝힐 핵심 인물로 출석이 반드시 필요합니다." 선거관리위원회 감사에선, 야당이 관련 의혹에 선관위의 조사가 필요하다고 강하게 몰아붙였고, 여당은 명태균 씨의 허풍에서 불거진 일이라며 대통령과 김 여사를 엄호했습니다. "이 부분에 대해서는 명명백백히 진실을 가릴 필요가 있습니다...선관위에서 고발된 사건을 넘어서서 이 전모에 대해서 밝혀야 됩니다." "욕심 많은 정치인하고 허풍이 있는 그런 비슷한 사람이 합작을 해가지고...대통령님과 여사를 판 그런...

title: Banca Mediolanum inaugura a Roma l’8° ufficio dei consulenti finanziari
content: ROMA (ITALPRESS) – Si rafforza la presenza di Banca Mediolanum a Roma con l’inaugurazione dell’ottavo ufficio dei consulenti finanziari. La nuova apertura si inserisce nella volontá da parte di Banca Mediolanum di investire ulteriormente nel territorio della Capitale, dove l’istituto opera da sempre. Una presenza concreta che sia di riferimento per i risparmiatori, con l’obiettivo di offrire loro una consulenza finanziaria mirata a valorizzare il risparmio e il patrimonio delle famiglie; un’attenzione analoga é rivolta anche alle eccellenze imprenditoriali della cittá e della regione alle quali la Banca offre un approccio integrato di servizio, funzionale al loro sviluppo. “Aprire sul territorio é importante perchê siamo convinti che la tecnologia non sostituirá mai la relazione umana – ha detto il direttore generale di Banca Mediolanum, Igor Garzesi -. Il nostro fondatore Ennio Doris ricordava sempre che la nostra missione é quella di essere utili alle famiglie italiane e l’unico modo per farlo é essere vicini ai nostri clienti. Il nostro compito é accompagnarli, aiutarli a prendere le migliori decisioni finanziarie e lo faremo con grande piacere”. Banca Mediolanum opera nella provincia di Roma con 21 uffici e 414 consulenti finanziari di cui 248 a Roma cittá in 8 uffici, mentre nella regione Lazio é presente con 30 uffici e 515 consulenti finanziari. “La nostra azienda é presente sul territorio da sempre. L’ultimo ufficio in ordine cronologico, che abbiamo...

title: Ted Cruz Gets Polling Boost in Texas
content: Ted Cruz has a five-point lead over Democratic rival Colin Allred in the senator's battle to secure reelection in November according to a new poll. The Marist Poll survey of 1,186 Texas likely voters put Cruz on 51 percent ahead of Allred, who currently sits in the House of Representatives, on 46 percent. However the poll did put Allred ahead with independent voters by 51 percent against 43 percent. The survey was conducted from October 3 to 7 and had a 3.6 point margin of error. Notably the Marist Poll result gives Cruz a stronger lead than recent surveys by Florida Atlantic University and RMG Research, which put the Republican incumbent ahead by just three percent. Earlier this month Cruz told were later adding "if they take Texas, they can take over the country completely." The new survey also has good news for Republican presidential nominee , who has a comfortable eight-point lead over his opposite number with 53 percent of the vote against 46 percent. Retaining Cruz's Texas seat would be an important step toward the Republican goal of seizing the in November. Currently the upper chamber has a slim Democratic majority, with 51 Senators aligned with the party versus 49 . However the GOP is widely expected to take the West Virginia seat currently occupied by , an independent who caucuses with the Democrats and isn't standing for reelection. Democrats have been targeting the seats of Cruz and Senator of Florida with a recently announced in TV advertising. contacted Senator...

title: Borsa: l’Europa incerta in attesa dei dati Usa, debole Madrid
content: MILANO, 10 OTT – Mercati azionari del Vecchiocontinente generalmente fiacchi, in attesa dell’avvio di Wallstreet, su cui i futures sono ancora incerti, e soprattuttodella raffica di dati sull’economia statunitense che anticipal’avvio della Borsa Usa. In questo clima, il listino peggiore in Europa è quello diMadrid che perde lo 0,8%, mentre Amsterdam cede lo 0,3%, Londrae Parigi lo 0,2% e Francoforte oscilla sulla parità. Di qualche frazione meglio di tutti fa Piazza Affari, chesale dello 0,3%, con Bper che corre del 5,4% a 5,6 euro dopol’approvazione del piano industriale al 2027 che promette diconseguire nel prossimo triennio 4,3 miliardi di utili e didistribuire 3,2 miliardi ai soci, con un pay-out del 75%. In aumento di due punti percentuali Unipol e la Popolare diSondrio, con Banco Bpm, Mps, Generali e Unicredit in crescitaampiamente oltre il punto. Tra i titoli principali, Tim invecescende di un punto percentuale, con Iveco che cede l’1,4% ePrysmian l’1,8%. Sui mercati valutari l’euro tiene a 1,093 contro il dollaro,con lo spread Btp-Bund a 10 anni in lieve calo a 129 punti base.Nel settore dell’energia il petrolio sale dell1,3% a 74 dollarial barile e il gas è in crescita del 2,9% a 39,4 euro alMegawattora.

title: Rafa Nadal, 'Cum laude' a los valores
Rafa Nadal, 'Cum laude' a los valores
creator: Ignacio Tylko
content: Copiar enlace WhatsApp Facebook X (antes Twitter) LinkedIn Telegram Threads Quizá nadie en España genera tanto cariño y es unánimemente tan apreciado como Rafa Nadal, el tipo perfecto, el hijo con el que un padre siempre soñó, el padre ejemplar, el yerno ideal, el marido extraordinario y el paradigma de lo que representan los valores del deporte. Se trata del personaje público al que jamás se le escuchó una declaración altisonante, el compañero ideal cuando se compite por equipos en la Copa Davis y hasta el inquilino más carismático en el palco del Santiago Bernabéu cuando de una gran cita continental de su Real Madrid del alma se trata. No hay . La final de la Copa Davis, del 19 al 24 de noviembre en Málaga, será el último torneo del tenista manacorense, la competición que cerrará su círculo. Como el propio tenista manifesta en el vídeo en el que da a conocer su adiós, fue muy feliz con el éxito en la Davis de Sevilla de 2004 con el que asombró al universo. Y es que defender a su país, ya fuera en el torneo de la Ensaladera de Plata o en los Juegos Olímpicos, representó siempre una motivación extra, una fuente inagotable de orgullo. Gracias a una trayectoria majestuosa, a su capacidad de sacrificio y a un palmarés asombroso, Nadal ha estado en boca de todos siempre a pesar de su timidez. El sinfín de lesiones que le han maltratado, han golpeado también los aficionados. A partir ahora, el pundonor y la garra del tenista ya no se verán en las...

title: Ρωσία: Το Κρεμλίνο απορρίπτει τον ισχυρισμό της MI5 ότι Ρώσοι πράκτορες σχεδιάζουν να προκαλέσουν χάος σε Βρετανία και Ευρώπη
content: Ο επικεφαλής της MI5 Κεν Μακάλουμ ανέφερε σε μια ομιλία προχθές, Τρίτη, πως η GRU είναι σε «διαρκή αποστολή για να προκαλέσει χάος στους δρόμους της Βρετανίας και της Ευρώπης: έχουμε δει εμπρησμό, δολιοφθορά και περισσότερα». Ο εκπρόσωπος του Κρεμλίνου Ντμίτρι Πεσκόφ δήλωσε στους δημοσιογράφους πως η Ρωσία δεν θα δεχθεί τέτοιους ισχυρισμούς και πως δεν αξίζουν να τους δίνεται προσοχή. «Όλες αυτές οι δηλώσεις είναι απολύτως ατεκμηρίωτες και αβάσιμες», είπε. Στο υπόβαθρο του πολέμου στην Ουκρανία, ευρωπαϊκές χώρες και η συμμαχία του ΝΑΤΟ έχουν κατηγορήσει Ρώσους κατασκόπους ότι έχουν ξεκινήσει εχθρικές δραστηριότητες σε όλη την ήπειρο τους τελευταίους μήνες. Σε κοινό άρθρο στους Financial Times τον περασμένο μήνα, οι επικεφαλής της Κεντρικής Υπηρεσίας Πληροφοριών (CIA) των ΗΠΑ και της βρετανικής εξωτερικής υπηρεσίας κατασκοπείας MI6 ανέφεραν πως εργάζονται από κοινού προκειμένου να διαταράξουν μια «απερίσκεπτη εκστρατεία δολιοφθοράς σε όλη την Ευρώπη την οποία διεξάγουν οι ρωσικές υπηρεσίες πληροφοριών, και την κυνική χρήση της τεχνολογίας για τη διάδοση ψεμάτων και παραπληροφόρησης που έχει σχεδιαστεί για να βλάψει τις καλές σχέσεις μεταξύ μας». Πηγή: ΑΜΠΕ ΒΡΕΤΑΝΙΑ ΕΥΡΩΠΗ ΡΩΣΙΑ Δημοφιλή Προτεινόμενα για εσάς

title: GN evaluará a candidatos para fiscal general local
creator: Rodrigo Cerezo
content: A nueve meses de que el cargo está vacante, el Consejo Judicial Ciudadano (CJC) da el primer paso para la designación del titular de la Fiscalía General de Justicia de la Ciudad de México ; para el proceso, colaborará con la Guardia Nacional (GN) para que lleve a cabo la evaluación y certificación de confianza de los aspirantes. Este jueves, el CJC aprobó la creación de un grupo de trabajo conformado por cuatro integrantes, quienes elaborarán la convocatoria para elegir al nuevo titular de la Fiscalía General de Justicia local y fiscalías especializadas. Asimismo, tendrá que proponer una terna y presentarla a la jefa de Gobierno , Clara Brugada , quien presentará un aspirante ante el Congreso local para que sea ratificado. Este grupo de trabajo está integrado por los consejeros Emiliano Robles, Héctor Muñoz, José Francisco Sánchez y Sandra Margarita Rivas, también participan el presidente del Consejo, Jorge Nader Kuri, y el secretario técnico, Irving Pedro Chegüe. Cuando el proyecto de convocatoria esté listo, el Consejo deberá votar de nuevo para su aprobación y fijar las fechas del proceso. Respecto a la evaluación de candidatos que lleguen a la última etapa, Nader Kuri señaló: “Nunca había intervenido la Guardia Nacional en la práctica de exámenes de control de confianza para la Fiscalía de la Ciudad de México. Es la primera vez”. Indicó que dichas pruebas son realizadas por instituciones autorizadas en México y se componen por varias...

title: ميدل ايست آي عن مصادر: شكوك إيرانية جدية في اختراق إسرائيلي للحرس الثوري وخاصة أولئك الذين يعملون على الساحة اللبنانية
Tepić vs. Rio Tinto: "Tajni mejl", javni događaj i dogovor sa Vučićem
content: Po njenim rečima, taj mejl pokazuje da je postignut dogovor sa Vučićem da se litijum rudari, prenosi N1 . Povodom ovog slučaja oglasio se i Rio Tinto. Tepić dodaje da je važno pokazati koje alate koristi režim Aleksandra Vučića za lobiranje za ovu kompaniju. "Imam obavezu da otkrijem i razokrijem čitavu hronolgiju stvari. Videla sam i reakciju Rio Tinta na to moje izlaganje, gde su oni rekli da sam iznela netačne podatke, što ne vidite u njihovom saopštenju. Oni potvrđuju sve što sam rekla, da su imali sastanak sa Vučićem 2021, da je to javno objavljeno, da to nije nikakva rajna. Ja nisam ni rekla da je to tajna", navodi Tepić. Ipak, navodi, postoji privatni mejl koji pokazuje dogovore o rudarenju litijuma. "Ključna je razlika to što je to predstavljeno kao infromisanje Vučića o aktivnostima kompanije Rio Tinto, a onda, u tom ipak tajnom mejlu, koji sam ja pokazala, između Rio Tinta i evropskog komesara Šefčovića, sam Rio Tinto kaže: 'dogovorili smo se sa Aleksandrom Vučićem... Nama se sve vreme spočitava da je bivša vlast dogovorila. Ovaj mejl između direktora Rio Tinta i evropskog komesara je dokaz koji kaže dogovorili smo sa Vučićem za rudarenje litijuma" , navodi Tepić za N1. U skupštini je poslanica iznela i informacije o slovačkoj kompaniji InoBat. "Druga stvar, koja mi je bila važna, jeste ta slovačka kompanija InoBat, koja je najavila da će u Ćupriji graditi fabriku baterija. To podrazumeva da će pola milijarde evra novca...

title: «الفردان» ومنتجع «سانت ريجيس الموج مسقط» يحتفلان بالافتتاح الرسمي
creator: كاتب
content: برعاية ذي يزن بن هيثم بن طارق آل سعيد، وزير الثقافة والرياضة والشباب، تم الافتتاح الرسمي لمنتجع «سانت ريجيس الموج مسقط». وفي أمسية مميزة، شارك في حفل الافتتاح أكثر من 200 ضيف من كبار الشخصيات في عُمان والمنطقة، وإدارة مجموعتي «الفردان» و«ماريوت الدولية»، وبحضور نجم بوليوود سيف علي خان. وخلال الافتتاح، قال عمر الفردان، الرئيس التنفيذي لمجموعة «الفردان»: «يبرز هذا المشروع ليؤكد العلاقات الثنائية بين عُمان وقطر ورؤيتنا المشتركة المتمثلة في تحقيق التنوع الاقتصادي وتنمية مختلف القطاعات وفي مقدمتها قطاع الضيافة». وأضاف: «نحن فخورون بافتتاح منتجع (سانت ريجيس الموج مسقط)، الذي يشكل نموذجاً حقيقياً للفخامة والأناقة في مسقط العامرة. وبالطبع يبرز تعاوننا الوثيق مع فنادق ومنتجعات (سانت ريجيس)، والتزامنا وسعينا المستمر لتحقيق التميّز والوفاء بالوعد الذي قطعناه لعملائنا بتقديم أرقى التجارب لهم». وتابع: «اليوم، ومن خلال افتتاح المنتجع، نعتز بالمساهمة في نمو وتطور قطاع السياحة والاقتصاد في عُمان؛ إيماناً منا بمكانتها ومقوماتها وجمالها الطبيعي الذي يجعل منها وجهة عالمية للضيوف والزوار والسائحين من جميع أنحاء العالم». ومن جانبه، أعرب ديفيد ماريوت، رئيس مجلس إدارة مجموعة «ماريوت الدولية»، عن سعادته قائلاً: «نحتفل اليوم، بالتعاون مع مجموعة (الفردان)، بافتتاح منتجع (سانت ريجيس الموج مسقط)». مضيفاً: «تُعد سلطنة عُمان وجهة سياحية جاذبة تستقطب الزوار من جميع أنحاء العالم للاستمتاع بجمالها الطبيعي وتراثها الثقافي الغني. يقدم المنتجع مزيجاً متناغماً بين الإرث العريق لعُمان والفخامة الراقية التي تجسدها علامة (سانت ريجيس)، مما يجعل هذا الافتتاح خطوة بارزة في جهودنا المستمرة لدعم...

title: Städtetag warnt wegen Finanznot vor Einschnitten in Kommunen
content: München - Der Bayerische Städtetag warnt vor einer immer kritischeren finanziellen Lage der Kommunen und möglichen drastischen Konsequenzen: Sollte die Finanzausstattung der Kommunen nicht gesichert werden, würde dies die soziale, schulische, gesundheitliche und technische Infrastruktur gefährden. "Fehlende Mittel bedeuten, dass Städte und Gemeinden dringende Investitionen in Kitas und Schulen, in die Infrastruktur mit Straßen und Wegen, in die Energieversorgung oder den öffentlichen Nahverkehr schieben oder streichen müssen", sagte der Städtetagsvorsitzende Markus Pannermayr. Oder Kommunen müssten sich verschulden - doch auch hier gebe es Grenzen. "Da braut sich einiges zusammen", sagte der Straubinger Oberbürgermeister. "Städte und Kommunen werden vermehrt in die Situation kommen, ihre Haushalte ab 2025 nicht mehr ausgleichen zu können." Die Steuereinnahmen stagnierten, während die Ausgaben "massiv steigen". Dadurch werde das Aufstellen von genehmigungsfähigen Haushalten immer schwieriger. Betroffen seien Städte und Gemeinden im ganzen Freistaat. "Wenn Städte und Gemeinden keine Haushalte mehr aufstellen können, sind sie nicht mehr handlungsfähig, sie können die für den Zusammenhalt unserer Gesellschaft so wichtigen freiwilligen Angebote für Bildung und Kultur, Sport und Vereinsleben nicht mehr wie bisher unterstützen." Personalkosten, Sozialausgaben und Bauausgaben seien rund 8 bis 15 Prozent gestiegen. Schon vergangenes Jahr hätten bayerische...

title: Саутгейт: "Я не вернусь к тренерской деятельности в течение года"
content: Бывший тренер сборной Англии Гарет Саутгейт рассказал, что пока не планирует возвращаться к тренерской деятельности. Я не буду тренировать в течение следующего года. Это точно. Мне нужно время, чтобы всё обдумать. Когда покидаешь такую большую должность, нужно дать время своему разуму.

title: ΑΔΜΗΕ: 1,7 δισ. ευρώ για τη διασύνδεση Δωδεκανήσων και Βορειοανατολικού Αιγαίου
creator: ΠΟΛΙΤΗΣ NEWS
content: Ξεκινά η Β' φάση του διεθνούς διαγωνισμού του ΑΔΜΗΕ, ύψους 1,7 δισ. ευρώ, με αντικείμενο τη σύναψη συμφωνίας - πλαίσιο για τα υποβρύχια καλωδιακά έργα εναλλασσόμενου ρεύματος 150 kV των διασυνδέσεων Δωδεκανήσων και των νησιών του Βορειοανατολικού Αιγαίου, ανακοίνωσε ο Διαχειριστής. Η πρώτη φάση της διαγωνιστικής διαδικασίας ολοκληρώθηκε το προηγούμενο διάστημα με την επιτυχή συμμετοχή των εταιρειών Fulgor Α.Ε, Nexans Norway A.S. και Prysmian Powerlink S.r.l. Στο πλαίσιο της δεύτερης φάσης του διαγωνισμού, οι συμμετέχουσες εταιρείες θα κληθούν να υποβάλουν την τελική οικονομική και τεχνική τους προσφορά, βάσει των οποίων θα προκύψει ο ανάδοχος ή οι ανάδοχοι του έργου. Η ανάθεση θα πραγματοποιηθεί με κριτήριο την πλέον συμφέρουσα προσφορά, από οικονομική άποψη. Ο αρχικός προϋπολογισμός του έργου ανέρχεται σε 1.717.000.000 ευρώ (πλέον ΦΠΑ) και η προβλεπόμενη διάρκεια της συμφωνίας - πλαίσιο ορίζεται στα 6 χρόνια από την υπογραφή της σύμβασης. Ο ΑΔΜΗΕ προχώρησε για πρώτη φορά στη συγκεκριμένη διαγωνιστική πρακτική, την οποία ακολουθούν και άλλοι Ευρωπαίοι Διαχειριστές, λόγω της υψηλής ζήτησης υποβρυχίων καλωδίων για έργα διασυνδέσεων σε διεθνές επίπεδο, εξασφαλίζοντας με αυτόν τον τρόπο τη διαθεσιμότητα χρονοθυρίδων παραγωγής στα εργοστάσια των αναδόχων. Σε αντίθεση με τη διενέργεια ανεξάρτητων διαγωνισμών, αναφέρει ο ΑΔΜΗΕ, η συμφωνία - πλαίσιο εξασφαλίζει πιο...

title: മനുഷ്യ ജീവിതത്തിന്റെ ദുർബലത തുറന്നുകാട്ടിയ ദക്ഷിണ കൊറിയൻ എഴുത്തുകാരി ഹാൻ കാങ്ങിന് സാഹിത്യ നൊബേൽ
creator: മാധ്യമം ലേഖകൻ
content: സോൾ: ഈ വർഷത്തെ സാഹിത്യ നൊബേൽ ദക്ഷിണ കൊറിയൻ എഴുത്തുകാരി ഹാൻ കാങ്ങിന്. ചരിത്രപരമായ ആഘാതങ്ങളെ അഭിമുഖീകരിക്കുകയും മനുഷ്യജീവിതത്തിന്റെ ദുര്‍ബലതകളെ തുറന്നുകാട്ടുകയും ചെയ്യുന്ന തീക്ഷ്ണതയുള്ള കാവ്യാത്മക ഗദ്യമാണ് ഹാന്‍ കാങ്ങിന്റേതെന്ന് പുരസ്‌കാര സമിതി വിലയിരുത്തി. 11 ലക്ഷം ഡോളറാണ് പുരസ്കാര തുക. 1970ൽ ദക്ഷിണ കൊറിയയിലെ ഗ്വാൻഞ്ജുവിലാണ് ഹാൻ കാങ് ജനിച്ചത്. സാഹിത്യ ബന്ധമുള്ള കുടുംബമായിരുന്നു അവരുടേത്. കാങ്ങിന്റെ പിതാവ് ഹാന്‍ സെങ് വോൺ അറിയപ്പെടുന്ന നോവലിസ്റ്റായിരുന്നു. 1993ൽ അഞ്ച് കവിതകളുടെ സമാഹാരം പ്രസിദ്ധീകരിച്ചുകൊണ്ടാണ് ഹാൻ സാഹിത്യലോകത്തേക്ക് കാലെടുത്തു വെച്ചത്. സോളിലെ വിന്റർ എന്നത് അതിലെ പ്രശസ്തമായ കവിതയായിരുന്നു. തൊട്ടടുത്ത വർഷം തന്നെ നോവലും എഴുതി വിസ്മയിപ്പിച്ചു ഹാൻ. റെഡ് ആങ്കർ എന്ന പേരിലുള്ള നോവലിന് സോൾ ഷിൻമുൻ സ്പ്രിങ് ലിറ്റററി മത്സരത്തിൽ ഒന്നാംസ്ഥാനം നേടുകയും ചെയ്തു. 1995ൽ ആദ്യ കഥാസമാഹാരവും പുറത്തിറക്കി. ഫ്രൂട്സ് ഓഫ് മൈ വുമൺ, ഫയർ സലമാണ്ടർ എന്നീ കഥാസമാഹാരങ്ങളും ബ്ലാക് ഡീർ, യുവർ കോൾഡ് ഹാൻഡ്സ്, ദ വെജിറ്റേറിയൻ, ബ്രെത്ത് ഫൈറ്റിങ്, ഗ്രീക്ക് ലെസൺസ്, ഹ്യൂമൻ ആക്ട്സ്, ദ വൈറ്റ് ബുക്ക്, ഐ ഡു നോട്ട് ബിഡ് ഫെയർവെൽ എന്നീ നോവലുകളും ഐ പുട് ദ ഈവനിങ് ഇൻ ദി ​ഡ്രോവർ എന്ന കവിത സമാഹാരവും പുറത്തിറക്കി. 2016ൽ ദ വെജിറ്റേറിയൻ എന്ന ഗ്രന്ഥത്തിന് ഇന്റർനാഷനൽ ബുക്കൽ പ്രൈസ് പുരസ്കാരവും കാങ് സ്വന്തമാക്കി. ഏറ്റവും പുതിയ നോവലായ ഐ ഡു നോട് ബിഡ് ഫെയർവെൽ 2024ലെ എമിലി ഗ്വിയ്മെറ്റ് പുരസ്കാരവും 2023ലെ മെഡിസിസ് പുരസ്കാരവും നേടി. സാള്‍ ഇന്‍സ്റ്റിറ്റ്യൂട്ട് ഓഫ് ആര്‍സില്‍ ക്രിയേറ്റീവ് റൈറ്റിങ് അധ്യാപികയായ ഹാന്‍ സംഗീതജ്ഞയും കലാകാരിയും കൂടിയാണ്.

title: Krivična prijava protiv zaposlenog Doma zdravlja u Baru zbog posjedovanja narkotika
creator: portal@dan.co.me (DAN portal)
content: Policija je postupala po prijavi direktorice Doma zdravlja u Baru, i pronašla u službenom vozilu koje duži zaposleni V.N. (36) veću količinu tableta, 26 ampula Diazepam, 157 ampula Bensedin, koje se nalaze na listi opojnih droga psihotropnih supstanci, kao i drugog sanitetskog materijala, koje se mogu koristitit za proizvodnju opojnih droga. - Policijski službenici su shodno naredbi suda izvršili pretres stana koje koristi V.N. kao i pretres vozila u njegovom vlasništvu. Pretresom stana pronađeno je 108 ampula Bensedin i 8 ampula Diazepam, dok je pretresom vozila pronađeno 30 farmaceutskih tableta Diazepam, koje se nalaze na listi opojnih droga psihotropnih supstanci i bilja koje se može koristiti za proizvodnju droga. V.N. je, kako se sumnja, u službenom i privatnom vozilu kao i stanu koji koristi, držao radi dalje prodaje ukupno 265 ampula Bensedin, 34 ampule Diazepam i 30 farmaceutskih tableta Diazepam od 5 miligrama, navodi se u saopštenju. O predmetnom događaju je obaviješten državni tužilac u Višem državnom tužilaštvu u Podgorici, po čijem su nalogu protiv V.N. policijski službenici podnijeli krivičnu prijavu zbog sumnje da je počinio krivično djelo neovlašćena proizvodnja, držanje i stavljanje u promet opojnih droga.

title: Autopistas recibe el premio Elegido Servicio de Atención al Cliente del Año en el sector de infraestructuras y movilidad
creator: without@email.com (elplural.com)
content: Autopistas , filial de Abertis en España, ha sido reconocida en la 14a edición del certamen "Elegido Servicio de Atención al Cliente del Año" , como la empresa Servicio de Atención al cliente del año en el sector de infraestructuras y movilidad. Este galardón resalta el compromiso de Autopistas con la excelencia en la atención al cliente y su dedicación y compromiso en la mejora de la experiencia de los usuarios en las carreteras. Para otorgar la distinción, los promotores han analizado la capacidad de atención al cliente a través de los diferentes canales de comunicación a distancia con los que cuenta la empresa, es decir, teléfono, correo electrónico o formulario web, páginas web, redes sociales y aplicaciones. "Nuestra vocación de servicio al cliente y de mejora continua hace que sistemáticamente analicemos nuestro trabajo diario e impulsemos nuevas iniciativas para dar respuesta a las necesidades actuales y futuras de nuestros clientes. En Autopistas trabajamos sobre la base de que el cliente está en el centro de nuestras decisiones y esta idea nos permite poner el foco en trabajar de manera colaborativa y con los mismos criterios desde todas las áreas de contacto con el cliente. Trabajamos para mejorar la experiencia del cliente y reforzar la confianza cada vez que nos elige para desplazarse", ha explicado Nuria Marqués , manager de Centros Seguridad Vial y Clientes en Autopistas. El servicio al cliente como prioridad para Autopistas El trabajo de...

title: World Sight Day: Kalu Mulls Bills To Improve Eye Care Services In Nigeria
creator: James Kwen
content: Deputy Speaker of the House of Representatives, Hon. Benjamin Kalu has disclosed that certain bills were underway to address the challenges associated with accessing eye care services and generally improve the health system in the country. Kalu made the disclosure in commemoration of this year’s World Sight Day, the global event observed annually on the second Thursday of October to draw attention to blindness and vision impairment. The deputy speaker who is an advocate of eye health recently organised an outreach programme where thousands of Bende indigenes received free eye examinations, treatment, surgery and glasses prescription. Kalu, in a statement by his Special Assistant on Press Affairs, Udora Orizu, noted that this year’s theme, “Children, Love Your Eyes”, resonated with the agenda of the 10th House of Representatives, under Speaker Abbas Tajudeen tagged: “Healthcare for All” to address the multifaceted issues plaguing the nation’s healthcare system. He however expressed worry over reports that about 24 million people are living with vision loss and 1.3 million blind. The deputy speaker added that aside laudable initiatives of the Federal government, the parliament on its part is committed to using legislative instruments to support in providing lasting solution to the challenges. One of such measures according to him, was his sponsorship of the amendment bill of Optometrists and Dispensing Opticians Registration Council Act (Repeal and Enactment) Bill and National...

title: Neelam: Samir’s the kind of person who has no filter sometimes I get scared!
content: Neelam Kothari and Samir Soni Her arguments on her web series with her husband Samir Soni has the audience realised that it’s quite an ‘opposite attracts’ jodi. While Neelam comes across as a social person, Samir is rather anti-social. And the actress tells us that it takes efforts to make him do things for the show. Talking about how she convinces him every time he has to come on camera for their show Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives , Neelam shares, “The first day we shot with him he walked in with his boxers and ganji. Top Picks For You Mudassar Aziz: A filmmaker needs to carefully study while pegging a film around the idea of stardom I objected and he said well, it's a reality show and this is how I am at home. I said at least wear pyjamas and a t-shirt. And he refused saying, ‘You guys want me on the show? You want to shoot with me? This is the way I am!’ Finally, somehow, I convinced him, and he at least wore track pants and a t-shirt. But then the next challenge was to make him sit up as she was lying down on the couch and wanted to talk like that on camera. He just wanted it to be real.” At home, the other thing Neelam worries about Samir is that “he has no filter”! She elaborates saying, “Sometimes I get scared talking in front of him about anything thinking what if he spills the beans by mistake. If I'm gossiping with my friends, I make sure that he's not around because nothing stays in his stomach. He doesn't realise there's just no filter. Overall, he's just a...

title: Klaudia El Dursi skazana. Sąd wymierzył karę za brawurową jazdę pasem awaryjnym
content: Brawurowa jazda Klaudii El Dursi odbiła się głośnym echem w mediach. Przypomnijmy — pod koniec czerwca celebrytka pędziła z zawrotną prędkością swoim mercedesem po pasie awaryjnym autostrady. Choć prezenterka wyraziła skruchę i publicznie przeprosiła za swoje zachowanie, spotkała się z lawiną krytyki ze strony internautów . "Takie zachowanie absolutnie nie powinno mieć miejsca. Okazałam brak szacunku względem innych kierowców, za co jeszcze raz ogromnie przepraszam" — powiedziała gwiazda w oświadczeniu opublikowanym na Instagramie. W obronę swoją koleżankę wzięli wówczas między innymi: Blanka Lipińska , Sylwia Bomba i Grzegorz Collins . Już wiadomo, że modelka poniosła konsekwencje swoich czynów. Klaudia El Dursi ukarana Wirtualna Polska podaje, że sprawą celebrytki zajął się Sąd Rejonowy w Pruszkowie. W sprawie tej w dniu 27 sierpnia został wydany wyrok nakazowy, który jest prawomocny — cytuje fragment oświadczenia WP. W komunikacie przekazano również, że gwiazda została uznana za winną wykroczeń z art. 92 i 92 b. Za te wykroczenia sąd wymierzył karę wysokości 3 tys. zł z dodatkowym nałożeniem obowiązku uiszczenia kosztów postępowania w wysokości 350 zł — dodano. Klaudia El Dursi otrzymywała groźby W sierpniu gwiazda przyznała, że po wybuchu afery przechodziła trudny czas. To był trudny dla mnie moment, bardzo dotknęła mnie ta sytuacja. Zdecydowanie wyciągnęłam [wnioski – przyp. red.], to była dla mnie ogromna lekcja...

title: Escalating Tensions: Gaza Strikes and Regional Unrest
content: In a tragic incident on Thursday, an Israeli airstrike on a school in the Gaza Strip resulted in at least 27 fatalities, including a child and seven women, Palestinian medical officials reported. The school was sheltering displaced individuals amid ongoing military operations. The Israeli military claimed the target was a militant command post. This strike comes amid Israel's broader offensive against what it identifies as militant sites in Gaza, even as global focus shifts towards their conflicts with Hezbollah in Lebanon and escalating tensions with Iran. Israeli forces have intensified air and ground operations against Hamas in northern Gaza since earlier this week. The escalating conflict has led to significant humanitarian consequences, including the destruction of large areas in Gaza and the displacement of a vast majority of its 2.3 million residents. The situation continues to deteriorate as Iran, supporting armed groups in the region, launched retaliatory ballistic missile attacks against Israel. (With inputs from agencies.)

creator: كاتب
content: مُنحت جائزة «نوبل» للآداب لسنة 2024، اليوم (الخميس)، في استوكهولم للكاتبة الكورية الجنوبية هان كانغ البالغة 53 عاماً، وفقاً لـ«وكالة الصحافة الفرنسية». وأوضحت لجنة التحكيم، في بيان، أن هان كانغ التي تكتب قصائد وروايات باللغة الكورية، نالت الجائزة «عن نثرها الشعري المكثف الذي يواجه الصدمات التاريخية، ويكشف هشاشة الحياة البشرية». وتبلغ قيمة الجائزة 11 مليون كرونة سويدية (1.1 مليون دولار). - فيما يأتي لائحة بأسماء الفائزين بجائزة «نوبل» للآداب خلال الأعوام العشرة السابقة: - 2024: هان كانغ (كوريا الجنوبية). - 2023: يون فوسه (النرويج). - 2022: أنّي إرنو (فرنسا). - 2021: عبد الرزاق قرنح (مولود في تنزانيا ومقيم في بريطانيا). - 2020: لويز غلوك (الولايات المتحدة). - 2019: بيتر هاندكه (النمسا). - 2018: أولغا توكارتشوك (بولندا). - 2017: كازوو إيشيغورو (بريطانيا). - 2016: بوب ديلان (الولايات المتحدة). - 2015: سفيتلانا أليكسييفيتش (بيلاروسيا). - 2014: باتريك موديانو (فرنسا).

title: 比亞迪BYD長沙廠房直擊DENZA D9生產流程|走訪BYD五大品牌4S店 親嘗U8純電動四驅SUV駕乘體驗
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 比亞迪(BYD)早前邀請香港部份主流媒體代表,造訪位於湖南長沙的新能源汽車廠房,並深入了解兩款主要供港的比亞迪M6入門級MPV,以及DENZA D9豪華MPV的生產流程;廠方還安排於生產園區試乘由比亞迪自主研發的全自動集體運輸系統「雲巴」。隨後,香港傳媒更走訪長沙參觀比亞迪為旗下五大品牌-「仰望、騰勢、方程豹、海洋及王朝」開設的4S體驗店,並有機會試駕旗艦級純電動四驅SUV-仰望U8。文、圖:William(部分圖片) 比亞迪開設於長沙的廠房主要分為四大部份,包括衝壓間(將鋼板依模具壓製成不同的車身部件)、焊接間(採用先進的鐳射焊接車身工序)、塗裝間(車身噴塗全程自動化處理)和總裝間(利用熟練技工配合自動化機械,為新車進行最後的裝嵌工序,並為動力系統進行調校測試)等生產流程。 隨後的體驗環節為試乘附屬長沙廠房的全自動駕駛「雲巴」,列車設有3至4節車廂僅首尾兩節附設座椅以增加載客量,而每班列車上皆設有相關監測儀器,由一名監控員負責值勤,以保證列車運行暢順符合安全標準。列車內置鋰電及獨立驅動系統,並以多組車用輪胎運行感覺寧靜,「雲巴」另一賣點是可從容應付斜坡,加上高架路軌所佔空間較為狹窄,沿線又未有任何架空電纜所包圍,適宜空間有限人口稠密的市區環境,而車廂兩旁特大車窗設計,還提供有不俗的對外視野。據廠方指「雲巴」的平均能量消耗可低見0.8kWh/km,好適合新開發地區作短程的集體運輸用途。 比亞迪於長沙開設有旗下五大品牌的獨立4S體驗店,在廠方安排下傳媒率先走訪了「仰望」,當中主角包括純電動四驅SUV的U8,以及純電動超跑U9;及後,廠方還安排包括筆者在內的傳媒試駕U8環節,想不到愈3噸車重的旗艦級純電動四驅SUV,竟有如此強悍的爆發力量,而窄道掉頭更是裝備四輪獨立電馬達的U8強項。緊接而來是走訪騰勢的4S體驗店,場內焦點不僅是香港熱賣的DENZA D9豪華純電動MPV,還有剛火熱登場的全新騰勢Z9 GT豪華跑房車,以及主攻年輕人的全新騰勢N7中型SUV;至於方程豹的4S體驗店內,則擺放着多輛搭載不同戶外露營裝備的型號,可惜時間有限未能見識到方程豹的試駕體驗。隨後還走訪了海洋及王朝系列的4S體驗店,一次過飽覽比亞迪眾多車款實屬難得。

How to unlock the JAK Voltstorm in MW3 & Warzone
creator: Kurt Perry
content: The JAK Voltstorm has been added to MW3 and Warzone , and here’s how you can unlock this one-of-a-kind conversion kit. Added in Season 6 , the JAK Voltstorm is an Aftermarket Part that converts the Stormender into an electric shotgun. It will always one-shot enemies and can even chain between them to secure multiple kills, both in mutliplayer and battle royale. However, you will need to unlock it first to use it on your loadouts. Here’s how to get the JAK Voltstorm as fast as possible and our analysis of where it falls in the meta. How to get JAK Voltstorm The JAK Voltstorm is unlocked by completing any five weekly challenges from Season 6, Week 4 . These challenges can be completed across multiplayer, Warzone, and Zombies, so feel free to play whatever mode you prefer. Here are all of the weekly challenges for Season 6, Week 4: Get 25 Operator Kills while moving Get 20 Operator Hipfire Kills Get 10 Operator Quickscope Kills Destroy 5 Killstreaks Get 20 Operator Kills after having recently swapped weapons Get 10 Operator Kills with a weapon set to full auto mode EMP 5 Operators or killstreaks Get 300 Kills while moving Get 30 Kills with PHD Flopper explosions Get 1 Abomination Kill Get 1 Warlord Kill Get 250 Kills with an assault rifle while Speed Cola is active Get 150 Cryofreeze with an SMG Get 200 Kills in the High Threat Zone In Warzone Urzikstan, open 20 Loot Caches in the North-West region (Resort, Power, Seaport, Cargo) In Warzone Urzikstan, open 20 Loot Caches in the...

title: Bakan Bayraktar: EPİAŞ'ın halka arzı değerlendirilebilir
content: 10 Ekim 2024 14:45 T24 Ekonomi Enerji Bakanı Alparslan Bayraktar, "EPİAŞ bünyesinde kurulması planlanan karbon ve emtia piyasasının ardından halka arz değerlendirilebilir" dedi. Enerji Bakanı Alparslan Bayraktar, enerji borsası EPİAŞ'ın faaliyetlerinin önümüzdeki yıllarda genişleyeceğini, faaliyetlerin genişlemesinin ardından halka arzın değerlendirilebileceğini söyledi. Bayraktar Atlantic Council tarafından düzenlenen iki günlük konferansın dün akşamki oturumunda yaptığı konuşmada, şu anda elektrik ve doğalgaz borsası olarak faaliyet gösteren EPİAŞ'ın faaliyetlerinin önümüzdeki yıllarda çeşitleneceğini ifade etti. Bayraktar, şu anda taslak aşamasında bulunan karbon emisyonu ticaret sistemine atıfta bulunarak "Ülkemizin 2026'da artık karbonu fiyatlayan bir ülke haline gelmesi, bunun EPİAŞ bünyesinde bir karbon piyasası kurulması suretiyle gerçekleşmesini de hedefliyoruz... Ayrıca EPİAŞ'ın da beraberinde bir emtia borsası haline gelmesini de hedefliyoruz" dedi. Halka arz açıklaması Bayraktar konuşmasının ardından Reuters'ın EPİAŞ'ın halka arzının değerlendirilip değerlendirilmediği sorusu üzerine, EPİAŞ'ın faaliyetleri genişledikten sonra halka arz edilebileceğini ifade ederek, "Şu anda değil ama bu bahsettiğim faaliyetler yerleşsin bakacağız" dedi. Bayraktar ayrıca Türkiye'nin 2035 yılına kadar olan dönemi kapsayan ve yenilenebilir enerji yatırımları ile elektrik iletim hattı projelerini kapsayan yenilenebilir...

title: Хакеры взломали Internet Archive
content: На сайт Wayback Machine, принадлежащий некоммерческой организации Internet Archive, произошла хакерская атака, сообщил основатель платформы Брюстер Кале в X. По информации СМИ, произошла утечка данных более 31 млн пользователей. Кале заявил о DDoS-атаке (перегрузке сервера для скрытия попытки взлома). По информации The Verge, при заходе на сайт программы в течение нескольких часов висело сообщение от хакеров, которые сообщали об утечке данных пользователей. На настоящий момент сайт недоступен, а сообщение удалено. Джейсон Скотт, архивариус и куратор программного обеспечения Internet Archive, сказал, что хакеры совершили атаку «просто потому что могли», сообщило издание. Кале заявил в свою очередь, что был осуществлен взлом данных, содержащих имена пользователей, адреса их электронной почты и пароли.

title: Estas son las normas legales más importantes del jueves 10 de octubre del 2024
content: 06:45 | Lima, oct. 10. El boletín Normas Legales del Diario Oficial El Peruano difunde una serie de dispositivos de interés público y de impacto para la marcha del país. Conoce a continuación cuáles son los de mayor relevancia hoy. Lee también;[ Estas son las normas legales más importantes del miércoles 9 de octubre del 2024 ] Congreso de la República Modifican Código Procesal Penal para que la Policía Nacional investigue delitos . Ley N° 32130. El Poder Ejecutivo oficializó la ley, aprobada por el Congreso, que modifica diversos artículos del Código Procesal Penal, a fin de fortalecer la investigación del delito como función de la Policía Nacional y agilizar los procesos penales. Así, ahora el fiscal conducirá jurídicamente la investigación preliminar, la cual será llevada a cabo por la Policía Nacional, así como la investigación preparatoria, de acuerdo con el principio de legalidad. Asimismo, el fiscal, en cuanto tenga noticia del delito cometido, deberá disponer de forma inmediata que la Policía Nacional realice las diligencias preliminares. Congreso de la República Declaran de interés nacional implementación del Geoparque del Glaciar Quelccaya . Ley N° 32131 Se declara de interés nacional la implementación del Geoparque del Glaciar Quelccaya, ubicado entre los departamentos de Cusco y Puno. El Ministerio del Ambiente, a través del Instituto Nacional de Investigación en Glaciares y Ecosistemas de Montaña (Inaigem), priorizaría y...

title: Delapidare la Teatrul Bulandra. Planul prin care contabila șefă a furat 4 milioane de lei
creator: Redacția Jurnalul
content: Operațiunea s-a desfășurat în perioada 2018 - 2019 dar investigația oficială a început abia în 2024. Contabila șefă a avut și doi complici, casiera teatrului și o prietenă. Ea a făcut astfel 160 de plăţi fictive către 33 de presupuși colaboratori ai teatrului. Banii au reprerzentat plăți pentru drepturi de autor, însă acestea se realizau doar pe hârtie. În realitate, circa 4 milioane de lei au intrat în buzunarele celor trei femei. Suma reprezintă circa un sfert din banii de salarii pe care i-a plătit teatrul Bulandra în perioada respectivă. Poliţiştii spun că, în unele cazuri, contabila-şefă scria contracte pentru colaboratori reali ai teatrului dar îşi oprea o parte din banii pentru ei. , declară Crina Eșanu, purtător de cuvânt Poliţia Capitalei. title: Chiffre d'affaires stable et hausse du nombre de clients pour Ikea Belgique
content: Ces résultats représentent une très légère baisse (-0,83%) par rapport à "la performance record" de l'année précédente. Les magasins Ikea ont attiré 2,3% de clients (hors nourriture et services) en plus sur l'année fiscale 2024, soit 7,6 millions. Cette hausse est notamment liée au succès croissant de l'application et du site belges de l'entreprise, qui ont accueilli 18,5% de visiteurs supplémentaires, à 87,4 millions. Les ventes en ligne ont par ailleurs connu une augmentation de 10,7%. Pour faire à face une forte inflation ayant impacté le pouvoir d'achat des Belges, l'entreprise suédoise de mobilier et de décoration a décidé de réduire les prix de plus de 3.000 de ses articles, lui permettant ainsi de faire grimper ses volumes de vente de 3,5%. Le service de vente en seconde main de l'entreprise a connu un franc succès et a permis d'écouler 688.000 produits durant l'année écoulée, a assuré André Schmidtgall. L'enseigne suédoise a réduit son empreinte climatique de près de 17% durant l'exercice 2024, passant de 2.789 à 2.324 tonnes de CO2, notamment en investissant dans des systèmes de chauffage et de refroidissement durables. "Chaque tonne est évidemment une tonne de trop, mais nous avons prouvé cette année qu'il était possible d'opérer plus de volumes tout en réduisant les émissions", a commenté le CEO d'Ikea Belgique. Ce dernier a précisé que 45% des livraisons à domicile étaient effectuées en véhicules électriques, avec...

title: Kreative Impulse für eine nachhaltige Zukunft
参議院岩手選挙区補選 戦いの構図 5人が立候補
content: 10月9日の解散を受けて衆議院の選挙戦も事実上スタートしている中、10日告示を迎えた参議院岩手選挙区の補欠選挙。 その戦いの構図について見ていきます。 そもそもこの補欠選挙は自民党の議員だった広瀬めぐみ氏が、公設秘書の給与を巡る詐欺事件で議員辞職したことを受け実施されています。 自民党はこの補欠選挙への候補の擁立を見送っています。 立憲民主党の元議員・木戸口英司氏の陣営では、今回の選挙で野党共闘の態勢を整えるため、新たに立憲民主党と無所属の県議15人で構成する政治団体「岩手を守り日本を変える会」を結成しました。 岩手を守り日本を変える会 佐々木順一会長 「必ず前回を上回る得票で県民の期待に応えなければならない」 これは共産党と距離を置こうとする党本部の方針のもと、政治団体を介して野党連携の形を整えるためで、8日はこの団体と共産党県委員会が、自公政権の転換を目指すなどとした政策協定を締結。 共産党県委員会は木戸口氏を支援するとしています。 また木戸口氏については社民党県連合が推薦しているほか、国民民主党県連の支持母体・県民社協会と岩手友愛会も推薦を決めています。 一方、新人4人のうち参政党の吉田利也氏の陣営では、10日の第一声に神谷宗弊代表が訪れました。 参政党 神谷宗弊代表 「このまま放っといたら岩手県がどうなるかということを、優秀な10代の子たちに考えてもらう、岩手に帰ってきてもらう、もしくは残ってもらう」 神谷代表は自民党支持層の受け皿になることを目指す考えを示しています。 また政治団体・世問う国民党の代表・小田々豊氏は高知県でベンチャー企業を経営しています。 幸福実現党の総務会長を務める松島弘典氏は盛岡一高出身で商社への勤務経験があります。 無所属の田中亜弓氏は元滝沢市議で、動物愛護団体「ペットの里」の代表理事を務めています。 新人それぞれ独自の人脈を生かした戦いを進めるとみられます。 投票日は10月27日です。 岩手の最新ニュース、身近な話題、災害や事故の速報などを発信します。

title: Hurricane Milton likely to influence jobless claims: Economist
creator: Yahoo Finance Video
content: As experts believe Hurricane Milton could cause to Florida and its residents, how should economists interpret recent extreme weather events in relation to ? Deutsche Bank Securities explains to the Market Domination team how the string of severe storms could distort employment data and initial jobless claims in the near term. "We expect [initial jobless] claims to spike from [Hurricane] Helene, to show up this week in in the claims data. We're expecting initial claims to jump to around 240,000. You're going to see a further increase on the back of that and next week's data, the next several weeks probably," Ryan states. The economist lists off other key economic indicators that could be affected, including the purchasing managers' index (PMI) and oil production from the Gulf of Mexico To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination . Talk to us about how we should be thinking about how those events could impact the labor market moving forward. Yeah, it's, it's gonna make the labor market data look like a mess. creator: Aslı Aydıntaşbaş, Jeremy Shapiro
content: For the sixth episode of ECFR’s Swamp Chronicles, and welcome to , executive vice president of the Center for International Policy and former foreign policy advisor to senator Bernie Sanders. Together, they discuss American policy in the Middle East and the future of progressive foreign policy. Duss describes the Biden administration’s hesitancy to pressure Binyamin Netanyahu, and how the Democratic Party handles the struggle between its progressive and mainstream factions over America’s policy in the Middle East. He discusses who a Kamala Harris administration might appoint if the Democratics are victorious at the upcoming United States presidential election and shares his thoughts on the future of the war in Ukraine.

title: BPL union head hopeful on future
creator: Candia Dames Executive Editor candia@nasguard.com
content: Bahamas Electrical Workers Union (BEWU) President Kyle Wilson yesterday expressed confidence in the job security of union members as plans develop for the voluntary secondment of BPL workers to Bahamas Grid Company (BGC) early in the new year as part of the Davis administration’s energy reform agenda. “Everything is in play, the government is moving forward, and so if you stay stagnant, you still have to represent the members,” Wilson said. “Even if you agree with what’s happening you still have to make sure the best interests of the workers are served.” Wilson said every effort is being made to ensure that the workers’ rights are protected and agreements and laws are being followed. He added, “They’re being seconded, and it will be their right to choose if they desire to stay direct with the entity or if they remain the status quo of BPL employees.” After initial concerns expressed back in March, Wilson said the unions are sitting around the table as part of a transition committee to ensure that workers are treated fairly as part of the changes being made. “There’s a committee that has been formed for the transition to ensure that a smooth transition will take place where members are concerned,” he said. “Both unions are at the table and we’ve had three meetings and we meet biweekly now, and we’re just trying to work out and iron out all the kinks to make sure that the industrial agreement and the laws regarding labor and secondment and transfer of labor with respect to...

title: Baustellen in Erkelenz: Kölner Straße soll im November fertig sein
creator: Christos Pasvantis
content: Der Umbau der Erkelenzer Innenstadt geht in seine finale Phase – und der jetzige Zustand ist der für die Bürger und damit auch Gewerbetreibenden der vielleicht belastendste. Der Marktplatz bleibt eine Großbaustelle, und die Sanierungsarbeiten am kleinen Stück der Fußgängerzone der Kölner Straße sorgen dafür, dass Menschen mit Rollator kaum durchpassen. Für welche Belastung das sorgt, wurde auch bei der Hauptversammlung des Erkelenzer Gewerberings am Mittwochabend in der Oerather Mühle deutlich.

title: Războiul din Ucraina, ziua 960. 6 morţi şi 11 răniţi în Odesa, în urma unui atac rusesc cu rachete / Putin se laudă că Rusia nu are şomaj / Zelenski a anunţat că războiul s-ar putea termina în 2025 / Şeful Ucrainei a discutat Planul de Victorie cu premierul britanic
content: În Ucraina, niciun soldat nord-coreean nu luptă în armata rusă. Negarea vine de la Kremlin după ce, în ultimele zile, au venit informaţii contrare de la Kiev şi dinspre Seul. Un institut de presă ucrainean a informat weekendul trecut că şase ofiţeri nord-coreeni au murit într-un atac cu rachete ucrainene cu câteva zile mai devreme, lângă Doneţk, în estul Ucrainei ocupat de Moscova. Aceşti soldaţi nord-coreeni sunt ocupaţi să dea o mână de ajutor armatei ruse, care primeşte muniţii şi rachete care sosesc de la Phenian „Par o informaţie nouă (falsă), o prostie”, a declarat purtătorul de cuvânt al preşedintelui rus, Dmitri Peskov. Marina ucraineană a anunţat ieri că a distrus un depozit de drone kamikaze Shahed în apropierea oraşului Oktiabrski din regiunea Krasnodar (Rusia), în colaborare cu Serviciul de Securitate de la Kiev. „Potrivit informaţiilor disponibile – citim într-un comunicat publicat pe Telegram – în depozit erau în jur de 400 de drone la momentul atacului”. Distrugerea bazei „va reduce semnificativ capacitatea ocupanţilor ruşi de a teroriza civilii din oraşele şi satele ucrainene”, conchide declaraţia. Atacurile ruseşti asupra stocurilor şi proviziilor de cereale ucrainene „sunt o încălcare clară a dreptului internaţional şi trebuie să înceteze imediat. Rusia vizează în mod direct furnizarea de alimente către cei mai nevoiaşi oameni şi acest lucru demonstrează hotărârea Rusiei de a continua să...

title: Bedford town police chief's resignation announced
content: BEDFORD — Bedford Town Police Chief Ronnie Lewis Jr. is stepping down by the end of the year, he announced at a community meeting Tuesday. Lewis, who was sworn in as chief on May 16, 2022, did not give a reason for leaving the post during his talk that was posted on the town department’s Facebook page Tuesday evening. Just after announcing his upcoming departure, he thanked the men and women who serve the department of just more than 20 officers. “They’ve been an absolute joy to work with,” Lewis said. “This is the best group of people you could ever work with, and I am thankful for having the opportunity.” Lewis Reached for comment Wednesday, Lewis said various factors were involved in the decision, but he is not ready at this time to comment. He reiterated his appreciation for the 24 sworn police officers and three civilian officers who serve the department. Town Manager Bart Warner said at Tuesday’s Bedford Town Council meeting he regretted reporting that Lewis submitted his resignation effective Jan. 3, 2025. Warner said the town certainly appreciates Lewis’ service and wishes him well in the future. “I think he’s done a wonderful job,” Warner told The News & Advance just after the meeting concluded. Bedford Police Chief Ronnie Lewis poses for a portrait in the Bedford Municipal Building on Monday, May 16, 2022. Kendall Warner, The News & Advance file Warner would not comment further, stating it is a personnel-related matter. Mayor Tim Black said he was “shocked and...
